page.title: 02CRYNALLT JUNIOR SCHOOL 1
page.content: Crynallt Junior school caters for 307 children aged between 7 and 11.There is one headteacher,11 assistant teachers and a school ancillary.The children are taught in 10 mixed ability classes according to age.Subjects taught include mathematics,language,art,music,drama, environmental sciences,Welsh and project work.Children also engage in sporting activities; in winter boys play soccer and rugby , girls play netball and hockey; in summer boys play cricket and softball , girls play rounders , all do athletics and swimming.The school has a drama club, orchestra and choir.Children wear a school uniform which consists of a grey pullover,grey trousers/skirt,blue shirt and a maroon and blue tie.Most children eat a mid-day meal ,prepared and served on the school premises.
